title: The Block villain Jesse hints he might PROPOSE to girlfriend Mel when their house goes to auction
text:
If a couple can survive going on The Block together, they can surely survive anything.

And on Tuesday's episode, villain Jesse hinted that he might propose to girlfriend Mel during the live auctions later this month.

Speaking to foreman Dan, Jesse said he knew straight away that he'd marry her from their very first date.

'I knew after the first night that I was going to marry her!' The Block villain Jesse hinted on the show on Tuesday that he might PROPOSE to girlfriend Mel when their house goes to auction

'I knew after the first night with Mel that I was going to marry her,' Jesse told Dan.

He said the pair played a round of pool with some other revelers at the pub, when they won.

'Mel and I flogged them and we said 'buy us a drink,' and they said, ''we don't have any money,'' Jesse explained.

Boy talk: Speaking to foreman Dan, Jesse said that on their first date, he knew straight away that he'd marry her

He added: 'And Mel goes, ''where I grew up, you get bottled for doing that.''

'I'm in love, I'm in love!' he added with a laugh.

Dan asked if he'd propose this year, when Jesse said he had thought about it.

He then asked if it would be on the show, when Jesse replied: 'At the auction, if we win!'

Wedding bells? Dan asked if he'd propose this year, when Jesse said he had thought about it

Jesse and Mel have been dating for three years and on their Block bio, he calls her his 'secret weapon' for the show.

She also shared her thoughts on marriage, saying she'd like that with Jesse, but it's not a necessity.

'We definitely want to get married, but we want to get a house and have kids first. Marriage is just a bonus. We don't need that piece of paper,' she said.
